rules.natural: If the restaurant applies for a liquor license, then the restaurant obtains a liquor license
If the restaurant completes the application, then the restaurant applies for a liquor license
Either the restaurant receives a health violation or the restaurant is profitable
If the restaurant fails health inspection, then the restaurant does not receive a health violation
If the restaurant passes health inspection, then the restaurant does not receive a health violation
Either the health inspector conducts an inspection or the manager schedules a reinspection
If the manager schedules a reinspection, then the restaurant passes health inspection
If the restaurant meets standards, then the restaurant reopens
Either the restaurant meets standards or the restaurant fails standards

rules.prover9_expression: fails(Restaurant, Standards) -> (-(conducts(HealthInspector, Inspection) -> fails(Restaurant, HealthInspection)) -> closes(Restaurant, Temporarily))
rules.natural: If the restaurant fails standards, then, provided that the health inspector conducting an inspection does not result in the restaurant failing health inspection, the restaurant closes temporarily
If the restaurant maintains cleanliness, then the restaurant is profitable
Either the restaurant maintains cleanliness or the manager trains the staff
If the staff follows procedures, then the manager training the staff results in the restaurant being profitable
Either the staff follows procedures or the manager implements training
If the restaurant maintains its rating, then the restaurant improves its rating
If the restaurant increases revenue, then the restaurant attracts customers
If the restaurant expands its clientele, then the restaurant increases revenue
If the owner approves the menu, then the owner hires a manager
If the restaurant faces bankruptcy, then the restaurant thrives financially
If the restaurant experiences losses, then the restaurant does not thrive financially
Either the restaurant experiences losses or the restaurant avoids losses
If the restaurant avoids losses, then the restaurant does not thrive financially
If the owner monitors performance, then the owner reviews reports
If the owner analyzes data, then the owner studies trends
If the owner studies trends, then the owner reviewing reports triggers the restaurant increasing revenue provided that the restaurant is not profitable
If the owner approves the budget, then, if the restaurant is not profitable, the owner hires a head chef
If the head chef develops a signature dish, then the owner approves the menu
Either the head chef develops a signature dish or the manager develops a marketing plan
If the manager implements the marketing plan, then the manager developing a marketing plan leads to the owner approving the budget
If the health inspector conducting an inspection does not lead to the restaurant failing health inspection, then the restaurant does not close temporarily
If the manager implementing training does not lead to the manager training the staff triggering the restaurant being profitable, then the restaurant maintains its rating

If the manager implementing training does not result in the manager training the staff serving as sufficient condition for the restaurant being profitable, then the restaurant does not improve its rating
If the restaurant not being profitable does not lead to the owner hiring a head chef, then the restaurant faces bankruptcy
If the restaurant not being profitable does not cause the restaurant to expand its clientele, then the restaurant struggles financially
If the restaurant not being profitable does not result in the restaurant expanding its clientele, then the restaurant does not struggle financially
If the restaurant not being profitable does not cause the restaurant not to serve alcohol, then the restaurant completes the application
If the restaurant not being profitable does not trigger the restaurant not serving alcohol, then the restaurant does not obtain a liquor license
If the restaurant is not profitable, then the restaurant serves alcohol
If the restaurant is not profitable, then the restaurant does not attract customers
